strange_walker.name: Strange Walker
strange_walker.description: A figure that seems to glitch between standard pedestrian behaviors.

flirty_clerk.name: Flirty Clerk
flirty_clerk.description: Working the night shift. Too cheerful for this hour.

bar_drinker.name: Bar Drinker
bar_drinker.description: Trying to drown memories that won't stay submerged.

hostess.name: Radio Hostess
hostess.description: A soothing voice emanating from a physical form you didn't expect to see.
